price: 49. Zeg: “De waarheid is gekomen en de leugen kan nooit iets beginnen noch het doen herrijzen.”
arabic: قُلۡ جَآءَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَمَا يُبۡدِئُ ٱلۡبَٰطِلُ وَمَا يُعِيدُ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qul jāa al-ḥaqu wamā yub'di-u al-bāṭilu wamā yuʿīdu
